00073 typedef struct QuicktimeExport {
00074     QTMovie *movie;
00075     
00076     NSString *filename;
00077 
00078     QTTime frameDuration;
00079     NSDictionary *frameAttributes;
00080     
00081     NSString *videoTempFileName;
00082     /* Audio section */
00083     AUD_Device *audioInputDevice;
00084     AudioFileID audioFile;
00085     NSString *audioFileName;
00086     AudioConverterRef audioConverter;
00087     AudioBufferList audioBufferList;
00088     AudioStreamBasicDescription audioInputFormat, audioOutputFormat;
00089     AudioStreamPacketDescription *audioOutputPktDesc;
00090     SInt64 audioFilePos;
00091     char* audioInputBuffer;
00092     char* audioOutputBuffer;
00093     UInt32 audioCodecMaxOutputPacketSize;
00094     UInt64 audioTotalExportedFrames, audioTotalSavedFrames;
00095     UInt64 audioLastFrame;
00096     SInt64 audioOutputPktPos;
00097     
00098 } QuicktimeExport;

00106 /* Video codec */
00107 static QuicktimeCodecTypeDesc qtVideoCodecList[] = {
00108     {kRawCodecType, 1, "Uncompressed"},
00109     {k422YpCbCr8CodecType, 2, "Uncompressed 8-bit 4:2:2"},
00110     {k422YpCbCr10CodecType, 3, "Uncompressed 10-bit 4:2:2"},
00111     {kComponentVideoCodecType, 4, "Component Video"},
00112     {kPixletCodecType, 5, "Pixlet"},
00113     {kPNGCodecType, 6, "PNG"},
00114     {kJPEGCodecType, 7, "JPEG"},
00115     {kMotionJPEGACodecType, 8, "M-JPEG A"},
00116     {kMotionJPEGBCodecType, 9, "M-JPEG B"},
00117     {kDVCPALCodecType, 10, "DV PAL"},
00118     {kDVCNTSCCodecType, 11, "DV/DVCPRO NTSC"},
00119     {kDVCPROHD720pCodecType, 12, "DVCPRO HD 720p"},
00120     {kDVCPROHD1080i50CodecType, 13, "DVCPRO HD 1080i50"},
00121     {kDVCPROHD1080i60CodecType, 14, "DVCPRO HD 1080i60"},
00122     {kMPEG4VisualCodecType, 15, "MPEG4"},
00123     {kH263CodecType, 16, "H.263"},
00124     {kH264CodecType, 17, "H.264"},
00125     {kAnimationCodecType, 18, "Animation"},
00126     {0,0,NULL}};
00127 
00128 static int qtVideoCodecCount = 18;
00129 
00130 int quicktime_get_num_videocodecs()
00131 {
00132     return qtVideoCodecCount;
00133 }
00134 
00135 QuicktimeCodecTypeDesc* quicktime_get_videocodecType_desc(int indexValue)
00136 {
00137     if ((indexValue>=0) && (indexValue < qtVideoCodecCount))
00138         return &qtVideoCodecList[indexValue];
00139     else
00140         return NULL;
00141 }
00142 
00143 int quicktime_rnatmpvalue_from_videocodectype(int codecType)
00144 {
00145     int i;
00146     for (i=0;i<qtVideoCodecCount;i++) {
00147         if (qtVideoCodecList[i].codecType == codecType)
00148             return qtVideoCodecList[i].rnatmpvalue;
00149     }
00150 
00151     return 0;
00152 }
00153 
00154 int quicktime_videocodecType_from_rnatmpvalue(int rnatmpvalue)
00155 {
00156     int i;
00157     for (i=0;i<qtVideoCodecCount;i++) {
00158         if (qtVideoCodecList[i].rnatmpvalue == rnatmpvalue)
00159             return qtVideoCodecList[i].codecType;
00160     }
00161     
00162     return 0;   
00163 }

00168     {kAudioFormatLinearPCM, 1, "LPCM"},

00170     {kAudioFormatMPEG4AAC, 3, "AAC"},
00171     {0,0,NULL}};

00210 
00211 static NSString *stringWithCodecType(int codecType)
00212 {
00213     char str[5];
00214     
00215     *((int*)str) = EndianU32_NtoB(codecType);
00216     str[4] = 0;
00217     
00218     return [NSString stringWithCString:str encoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding];
00219 }
00220 
00221 void makeqtstring (RenderData *rd, char *string)
00222 {
00223     char txt[64];
00224 
00225     strcpy(string, rd->pic);
00226     BLI_path_abs(string, G.main->name);
00227 
00228     BLI_make_existing_file(string);
00229 
00230     if (BLI_strcasecmp(string + strlen(string) - 4, ".mov")) {
00231         sprintf(txt, "%04d-%04d.mov", (rd->sfra) , (rd->efra) );
00232         strcat(string, txt);
00233     }
00234 }
00235 
00236 void filepath_qt(char *string, RenderData *rd)
00237 {
00238     if (string==NULL) return;
00239     
00240     strcpy(string, rd->pic);
00241     BLI_path_abs(string, G.main->name);
00242     
00243     BLI_make_existing_file(string);
00244     
00245     if (!BLI_testextensie(string, ".mov")) {
00246         /* if we don't have any #'s to insert numbers into, use 4 numbers by default */
00247         if (strchr(string, '#')==NULL)
00248             strcat(string, "####"); /* 4 numbers */
00249 
00250         BLI_path_frame_range(string, rd->sfra, rd->efra, 4);
00251         strcat(string, ".mov");
00252     }
00253 }

00255 
00256 #pragma mark audio export functions
00257 
00258 static OSStatus write_cookie(AudioConverterRef converter, AudioFileID outfile)
00259 {
00260     // grab the cookie from the converter and write it to the file
00261     UInt32 cookieSize = 0;
00262     OSStatus err = AudioConverterGetPropertyInfo(converter, kAudioConverterCompressionMagicCookie, &cookieSize, NULL);
00263     // if there is an error here, then the format doesn't have a cookie, so on we go
00264     if (!err && cookieSize) {
00265         char* cookie = malloc(cookieSize);
00266         
00267         err = AudioConverterGetProperty(converter, kAudioConverterCompressionMagicCookie, &cookieSize, cookie);
00268         
00269         if (!err)
00270             err = AudioFileSetProperty (outfile, kAudioFilePropertyMagicCookieData, cookieSize, cookie);
00271             // even though some formats have cookies, some files don't take them
00272         
00273         free(cookie);
00274     }
00275     return err;
00276 }
00277 
00278 /* AudioConverter input stream callback */
00279 static OSStatus AudioConverterInputCallback(AudioConverterRef inAudioConverter, 
00280                          UInt32* ioNumberDataPackets,
00281                          AudioBufferList* ioData,
00282                          AudioStreamPacketDescription** outDataPacketDescription,
00283                          void* inUserData)
00284 {   
00285     if (qtexport->audioTotalExportedFrames >= qtexport->audioLastFrame) { /* EOF */
00286         *ioNumberDataPackets = 0;
00287         return noErr;
00288     }
00289 
00290     if (qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBytesPerPacket * *ioNumberDataPackets > AUDIOOUTPUTBUFFERSIZE)
00291         *ioNumberDataPackets = AUDIOOUTPUTBUFFERSIZE / qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBytesPerPacket;
00292     
00293     if ((qtexport->audioTotalExportedFrames + *ioNumberDataPackets) > qtexport->audioLastFrame)
00294         *ioNumberDataPackets = (qtexport->audioLastFrame - qtexport->audioTotalExportedFrames) / qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFramesPerPacket;
00295     
00296     qtexport->audioTotalExportedFrames += *ioNumberDataPackets;
00297     
00298     AUD_readDevice(qtexport->audioInputDevice, (UInt8*)qtexport->audioInputBuffer, 
00299                    qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFramesPerPacket * *ioNumberDataPackets);
00300     
00301     ioData->mBuffers[0].mDataByteSize = qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBytesPerPacket * *ioNumberDataPackets;
00302     ioData->mBuffers[0].mData = qtexport->audioInputBuffer;
00303     ioData->mBuffers[0].mNumberChannels = qtexport->audioInputFormat.mChannelsPerFrame;
00304     
00305     return noErr;
00306 }   
00307 
00308 
00309 #pragma mark export functions
00310 
00311 int start_qt(struct Scene *scene, struct RenderData *rd, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00312 {
00313     NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00314     NSError *error;
00315     char name[1024];
00316     int success= 1;
00317     OSStatus err=noErr;
00318 
00319     if(qtexport == NULL) qtexport = MEM_callocN(sizeof(QuicktimeExport), "QuicktimeExport");
00320     
00321     [QTMovie enterQTKitOnThread];       
00322     
00323     /* Check first if the QuickTime 7.2.1 initToWritableFile: method is available */
00324     if ([[[[QTMovie alloc] init] autorelease] respondsToSelector:@selector(initToWritableFile:error:)] != YES) {
00325         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "\nUnable to create quicktime movie, need Quicktime rev 7.2.1 or later");
00326         success= 0;
00327     }
00328     else {
00329         makeqtstring(rd, name);
00330         qtexport->filename = [[NSString alloc] initWithCString:name
00331                                   encoding:[NSString defaultCStringEncoding]];
00332         qtexport->movie = nil;
00333         qtexport->audioFile = NULL;
00334 
00335         if (rd->qtcodecsettings.audiocodecType) {
00336             // generate a name for our video & audio files
00337             /* Init audio file */
00338             CFURLRef outputFileURL;
00339             char extension[32];
00340             AudioFileTypeID audioFileType;
00341             
00342             switch (rd->qtcodecsettings.audiocodecType) {
00343                 case kAudioFormatLinearPCM:
00344                     audioFileType = kAudioFileWAVEType;
00345                     strcpy(extension,".wav");
00346                     break;
00347                 case kAudioFormatMPEG4AAC:
00348                 case kAudioFormatAppleLossless:
00349                     audioFileType = kAudioFileM4AType;
00350                     strcpy(extension, ".m4a");
00351                     break;
00352                 default:
00353                     audioFileType = kAudioFileAIFFType;
00354                     strcpy(extension,".aiff");
00355                     break;
00356             }
00357                     
00358             tmpnam(name);
00359             strcat(name, extension);
00360             outputFileURL = CFURLCreateFromFileSystemRepresentation(kCFAllocatorDefault,(UInt8*) name, strlen(name), false);
00361             
00362             if (outputFileURL) {
00363                 
00364                 qtexport->audioFileName = [[NSString alloc] initWithCString:name
00365                                                              encoding:[NSString defaultCStringEncoding]];
00366                 
00367                 qtexport->audioInputFormat.mSampleRate = U.audiorate;
00368                 qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatID = kAudioFormatLinearPCM;
00369                 qtexport->audioInputFormat.mChannelsPerFrame = U.audiochannels;
00370                 switch (U.audioformat) {
00371                     case AUD_FORMAT_U8:
00372                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 8;
00373                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatFlags = 0;
00374                         break;
00375                     case AUD_FORMAT_S24:
00376                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 24;
00377                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsSignedInteger;
00378                         break;
00379                     case AUD_FORMAT_S32:
00380                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 32;
00381                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsSignedInteger;
00382                         break;
00383                     case AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT32:
00384                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 32;
00385                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsFloat;
00386                         break;
00387                     case AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT64:
00388                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 64;
00389                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsFloat;
00390                         break;
00391                     case AUD_FORMAT_S16:
00392                     default:
00393                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 16;
00394                         qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsSignedInteger;
00395                         break;
00396                 }
00397                 qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBytesPerFrame = qtexport->audioInputFormat.mChannelsPerFrame * qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBitsPerChannel / 8;
00398                 qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFramesPerPacket = 1; /*If not ==1, then need to check input callback for "rounding" issues"*/
00399                 qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBytesPerPacket = qtexport->audioInputFormat.mBytesPerFrame;
00400                 qtexport->audioInputFormat.mFormatFlags |= kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsPacked;
00401                 
00402                 
00403                 /*Ouput format*/
00404                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatID = rd->qtcodecsettings.audiocodecType;
00405                 //TODO: set audio channels
00406                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mChannelsPerFrame = 2;
00407                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mSampleRate = rd->qtcodecsettings.audioSampleRate;
00408                 
00409                 /* Default value for compressed formats, overriden after if not the case */
00410                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFramesPerPacket = 0;
00411                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBytesPerFrame = 0;
00412                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBytesPerPacket = 0;
00413                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 0;
00414 
00415                 switch (rd->qtcodecsettings.audiocodecType) {
00416                     case kAudioFormatMPEG4AAC:
00417                         qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kMPEG4Object_AAC_Main;
00418                         /* AAC codec does not handle sample rates above 48kHz, force this limit instead of getting an error afterwards */
00419                         if (qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mSampleRate > 48000) qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mSampleRate = 48000;
00420                         break;
00421                     case kAudioFormatAppleLossless:
00422                         switch (U.audioformat) {
00423                             case AUD_FORMAT_S16:
00424                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kAppleLosslessFormatFlag_16BitSourceData;
00425                                 break;
00426                             case AUD_FORMAT_S24:
00427                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kAppleLosslessFormatFlag_24BitSourceData;
00428                                 break;
00429                             case AUD_FORMAT_S32:
00430                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kAppleLosslessFormatFlag_32BitSourceData;
00431                                 break;
00432                             case AUD_FORMAT_U8:
00433                             case AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT32:
00434                             case AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT64:
00435                             default:
00436                                 break;
00437                         }
00438                         break;
00439                     case kAudioFormatLinearPCM:
00440                     default:
00441                         switch (rd->qtcodecsettings.audioBitDepth) {
00442                             case AUD_FORMAT_U8:
00443                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 8;
00444                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = 0;
00445                                 break;
00446                             case AUD_FORMAT_S24:
00447                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 24;
00448                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsSignedInteger;
00449                                 break;
00450                             case AUD_FORMAT_S32:
00451                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 32;
00452                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsSignedInteger;
00453                                 break;
00454                             case AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT32:
00455                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 32;
00456                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsFloat;
00457                                 break;
00458                             case AUD_FORMAT_FLOAT64:
00459                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 64;
00460                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsFloat;
00461                                 break;
00462                             case AUD_FORMAT_S16:
00463                             default:
00464                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel = 16;
00465                                 qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags = kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsSignedInteger;
00466                                 break;
00467                         }
00468                         qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFormatFlags |= kLinearPCMFormatFlagIsPacked;
00469                         qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBytesPerPacket = qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mChannelsPerFrame * (qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel / 8);
00470                         qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFramesPerPacket = 1;
00471                         qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBytesPerFrame = qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBytesPerPacket;
00472                         break;
00473                 }
00474                                                 
00475                 err = AudioFileCreateWithURL(outputFileURL, audioFileType, &qtexport->audioOutputFormat, kAudioFileFlags_EraseFile, &qtexport->audioFile);
00476                 CFRelease(outputFileURL);
00477                 
00478                 if(err)
00479                     BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "\nQuicktime: unable to create temporary audio file. Format error ?");
00480                 else {
00481                     err = AudioConverterNew(&qtexport->audioInputFormat, &qtexport->audioOutputFormat, &qtexport->audioConverter);
00482                     if (err) {
00483                         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "\nQuicktime: unable to initialize audio codec converter. Format error ?");
00484                         AudioFileClose(qtexport->audioFile);
00485                         qtexport->audioFile = NULL;
00486                         [qtexport->audioFileName release];
00487                         qtexport->audioFileName = nil;
00488                     }
00489                     else {
00490                         UInt32 prop,propSize;
00491                         /* Set up codec properties */
00492                         if (rd->qtcodecsettings.audiocodecType == kAudioFormatMPEG4AAC) { /*Lossy compressed format*/
00493                             prop = rd->qtcodecsettings.audioBitRate;
00494                             AudioConverterSetProperty(qtexport->audioConverter, kAudioConverterEncodeBitRate,
00495                                                       sizeof(prop), &prop);
00496                             
00497                             if (rd->qtcodecsettings.audioCodecFlags & QTAUDIO_FLAG_CODEC_ISCBR)
00498                                 prop = kAudioCodecBitRateControlMode_Constant;
00499                             else
00500                                 prop = kAudioCodecBitRateControlMode_LongTermAverage;
00501                             AudioConverterSetProperty(qtexport->audioConverter, kAudioCodecPropertyBitRateControlMode,
00502                                                             sizeof(prop), &prop);
00503                         }
00504                         /* Conversion quality : if performance impact then offer degraded option */
00505                         if ((rd->qtcodecsettings.audioCodecFlags & QTAUDIO_FLAG_RESAMPLE_NOHQ) == 0) {                          
00506                             prop = kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterComplexity_Mastering;
00507                             AudioConverterSetProperty(qtexport->audioConverter, kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterComplexity,
00508                                                       sizeof(prop), &prop);
00509                             
00510                             prop = kAudioConverterQuality_Max;
00511                             AudioConverterSetProperty(qtexport->audioConverter, kAudioConverterSampleRateConverterQuality,
00512                                                       sizeof(prop), &prop);
00513                         }
00514                         
00515                         write_cookie(qtexport->audioConverter, qtexport->audioFile);
00516                         
00517                         /* Allocate output buffer */
00518                         if (qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBytesPerPacket ==0) /* VBR */
00519                             AudioConverterGetProperty(qtexport->audioConverter, kAudioConverterPropertyMaximumOutputPacketSize,
00520                                                   &propSize, &qtexport->audioCodecMaxOutputPacketSize);
00521                         else
00522                             qtexport->audioCodecMaxOutputPacketSize = qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBytesPerPacket;
00523                         
00524                         qtexport->audioInputBuffer = MEM_mallocN(AUDIOOUTPUTBUFFERSIZE, "qt_audio_inputPacket");
00525                         qtexport->audioOutputBuffer = MEM_mallocN(AUDIOOUTPUTBUFFERSIZE, "qt_audio_outputPacket");
00526                         qtexport->audioOutputPktDesc = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(AudioStreamPacketDescription)*AUDIOOUTPUTBUFFERSIZE/qtexport->audioCodecMaxOutputPacketSize,
00527                                                                    "qt_audio_pktdesc");
00528                     }
00529                 }
00530             }
00531             
00532             if (err == noErr) {
00533                 qtexport->videoTempFileName = [[NSString alloc] initWithCString:tmpnam(nil) 
00534                                                              encoding:[NSString defaultCStringEncoding]];           
00535                 if (qtexport->videoTempFileName)
00536                     qtexport->movie = [[QTMovie alloc] initToWritableFile:qtexport->videoTempFileName error:&error];
00537 
00538             }
00539         }
00540         else
00541             qtexport->movie = [[QTMovie alloc] initToWritableFile:qtexport->filename error:&error];
00542             
00543         if(qtexport->movie == nil) {
00544             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unable to create quicktime movie.");
00545             success= 0;
00546             if (qtexport->filename) [qtexport->filename release];
00547             qtexport->filename = nil;
00548             if (qtexport->audioFileName) [qtexport->audioFileName release];
00549             qtexport->audioFileName = nil;
00550             if (qtexport->videoTempFileName) [qtexport->videoTempFileName release];
00551             qtexport->videoTempFileName = nil;
00552             [QTMovie exitQTKitOnThread];
00553         }
00554         else {
00555             [qtexport->movie retain];
00556             [qtexport->movie setAttribute:[NSNumber numberWithBool:YES] forKey:QTMovieEditableAttribute];
00557             [qtexport->movie setAttribute:@"Made with Blender" forKey:QTMovieCopyrightAttribute];
00558             
00559             qtexport->frameDuration = QTMakeTime(rd->frs_sec_base*1000, rd->frs_sec*1000);
00560             
00561             /* specifying the codec attributes : try to retrieve them from render data first*/
00562             if (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType) {
00563                 qtexport->frameAttributes = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00564                                              stringWithCodecType(rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType),
00565                                              QTAddImageCodecType,
00566                                              [NSNumber numberWithLong:((rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality)*codecLosslessQuality)/100],
00567                                              QTAddImageCodecQuality,
00568                                              nil];
00569             }
00570             else {
00571                 qtexport->frameAttributes = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"jpeg",
00572                                              QTAddImageCodecType,
00573                                              [NSNumber numberWithLong:codecHighQuality],
00574                                              QTAddImageCodecQuality,
00575                                              nil];
00576             }
00577             [qtexport->frameAttributes retain];
00578             
00579             if (qtexport->audioFile) {
00580                 /* Init audio input stream */
00581                 AUD_DeviceSpecs specs;
00582 
00583                 specs.channels = U.audiochannels;
00584                 specs.format = U.audioformat;
00585                 specs.rate = U.audiorate;
00586                 qtexport->audioInputDevice = AUD_openReadDevice(specs);
00587                 AUD_playDevice(qtexport->audioInputDevice, scene->sound_scene, rd->sfra * rd->frs_sec_base / rd->frs_sec);
00588                                 
00589                 qtexport->audioOutputPktPos = 0;
00590                 qtexport->audioTotalExportedFrames = 0;
00591                 qtexport->audioTotalSavedFrames = 0;
00592                 
00593                 qtexport->audioLastFrame = (rd->efra - rd->sfra) * qtexport->audioInputFormat.mSampleRate * rd->frs_sec_base / rd->frs_sec;
00594             }
00595         }
00596     }
00597     
00598     [pool drain];
00599 
00600     return success;
00601 }
00602 
00603 int append_qt(struct RenderData *rd, int start_frame, int frame, int *pixels, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00604 {
00605     NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00606     NSBitmapImageRep *blBitmapFormatImage;
00607     NSImage *frameImage;
00608     OSStatus err = noErr;
00609     unsigned char *from_Ptr,*to_Ptr;
00610     int y,from_i,to_i;
00611     
00612     /* Create bitmap image rep in blender format (32bit RGBA) */
00613     blBitmapFormatImage = [[NSBitmapImageRep alloc] initWithBitmapDataPlanes:NULL
00614                                                                   pixelsWide:rectx 
00615                                                                   pixelsHigh:recty
00616                                                                bitsPerSample:8 samplesPerPixel:4 hasAlpha:YES isPlanar:NO
00617                                                               colorSpaceName:NSCalibratedRGBColorSpace 
00618                                                                 bitmapFormat:NSAlphaNonpremultipliedBitmapFormat
00619                                                                  bytesPerRow:rectx*4
00620                                                                 bitsPerPixel:32];
00621     if (!blBitmapFormatImage) {
00622         [pool drain];
00623         return 0;
00624     }
00625     
00626     from_Ptr = (unsigned char*)pixels;
00627     to_Ptr = (unsigned char*)[blBitmapFormatImage bitmapData];
00628     for (y = 0; y < recty; y++) {
00629         to_i = (recty-y-1)*rectx;
00630         from_i = y*rectx;
00631         memcpy(to_Ptr+4*to_i, from_Ptr+4*from_i, 4*rectx);
00632     }
00633     
00634     frameImage = [[NSImage alloc] initWithSize:NSMakeSize(rectx, recty)];
00635     [frameImage addRepresentation:blBitmapFormatImage];
00636     
00637     /* Add the image to the movie clip */
00638     [qtexport->movie addImage:frameImage
00639                   forDuration:qtexport->frameDuration
00640                withAttributes:qtexport->frameAttributes];
00641 
00642     [blBitmapFormatImage release];
00643     [frameImage release];
00644     
00645     
00646     if (qtexport->audioFile) {
00647         UInt32 audioPacketsConverted;
00648         /* Append audio */
00649         while (qtexport->audioTotalExportedFrames < qtexport->audioLastFrame) { 
00650 
00651             qtexport->audioBufferList.mNumberBuffers = 1;
00652             qtexport->audioBufferList.mBuffers[0].mNumberChannels = qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mChannelsPerFrame;
00653             qtexport->audioBufferList.mBuffers[0].mDataByteSize = AUDIOOUTPUTBUFFERSIZE;
00654             qtexport->audioBufferList.mBuffers[0].mData = qtexport->audioOutputBuffer;
00655             audioPacketsConverted = AUDIOOUTPUTBUFFERSIZE / qtexport->audioCodecMaxOutputPacketSize;
00656             
00657             err = AudioConverterFillComplexBuffer(qtexport->audioConverter, AudioConverterInputCallback,
00658                                             NULL, &audioPacketsConverted, &qtexport->audioBufferList, qtexport->audioOutputPktDesc);
00659             if (audioPacketsConverted) {
00660                 AudioFileWritePackets(qtexport->audioFile, false, qtexport->audioBufferList.mBuffers[0].mDataByteSize,
00661                                       qtexport->audioOutputPktDesc, qtexport->audioOutputPktPos, &audioPacketsConverted, qtexport->audioOutputBuffer);
00662                 qtexport->audioOutputPktPos += audioPacketsConverted;
00663                 
00664                 if (qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFramesPerPacket) { 
00665                     // this is the common case: format has constant frames per packet
00666                     qtexport->audioTotalSavedFrames += (audioPacketsConverted * qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mFramesPerPacket);
00667                 }
00668                 else {
00669                     unsigned int i;
00670                     // if there are variable frames per packet, then we have to do this for each packeet
00671                     for (i = 0; i < audioPacketsConverted; ++i)
00672                         qtexport->audioTotalSavedFrames += qtexport->audioOutputPktDesc[i].mVariableFramesInPacket;
00673                 }
00674                 
00675                 
00676             }
00677             else {
00678                 //Error getting audio packets
00679                 BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unable to get further audio packets from frame %i, error = 0x%x",(int)qtexport->audioTotalExportedFrames,err);
00680                 break;
00681             }
00682 
00683         }
00684     }
00685     [pool drain];   
00686 
00687     return 1;
00688 }
00689 
00690 
00691 void end_qt(void)
00692 {
00693     NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00694     if (qtexport->movie) {
00695         
00696         if (qtexport->audioFile)
00697         {
00698             NSDictionary *dict = nil;
00699             QTMovie *audioTmpMovie = nil;
00700             NSError *error;
00701             NSFileManager *fileManager;
00702             
00703             /* Mux video and audio then save file */
00704             
00705             /* Write last frames for VBR files */
00706             if (qtexport->audioOutputFormat.mBitsPerChannel == 0) {
00707                 OSStatus err = noErr;
00708                 AudioConverterPrimeInfo primeInfo;
00709                 UInt32 primeSize = sizeof(primeInfo);
00710                 
00711                 err = AudioConverterGetProperty(qtexport->audioConverter, kAudioConverterPrimeInfo, &primeSize, &primeInfo);
00712                 if (err == noErr) {
00713                     // there's priming to write out to the file
00714                     AudioFilePacketTableInfo pti;
00715                     pti.mPrimingFrames = primeInfo.leadingFrames;
00716                     pti.mRemainderFrames = primeInfo.trailingFrames;
00717                     pti.mNumberValidFrames = qtexport->audioTotalSavedFrames - pti.mPrimingFrames - pti.mRemainderFrames;
00718                     AudioFileSetProperty(qtexport->audioFile, kAudioFilePropertyPacketTableInfo, sizeof(pti), &pti);
00719                 }
00720                 
00721             }
00722             
00723             write_cookie(qtexport->audioConverter, qtexport->audioFile);
00724             AudioConverterDispose(qtexport->audioConverter);
00725             AudioFileClose(qtexport->audioFile);
00726             AUD_closeReadDevice(qtexport->audioInputDevice);
00727             qtexport->audioFile = NULL;
00728             qtexport->audioInputDevice = NULL;
00729             MEM_freeN(qtexport->audioInputBuffer);
00730             MEM_freeN(qtexport->audioOutputBuffer);
00731             MEM_freeN(qtexport->audioOutputPktDesc);
00732             
00733             /* Reopen audio file and merge it */
00734             audioTmpMovie = [QTMovie movieWithFile:qtexport->audioFileName error:&error];
00735             if (audioTmpMovie) {
00736                 NSArray *audioTracks = [audioTmpMovie tracksOfMediaType:QTMediaTypeSound];
00737                 QTTrack *audioTrack = nil;
00738                 if( [audioTracks count] > 0 )
00739                 {
00740                     audioTrack = [audioTracks objectAtIndex:0];
00741                 }
00742             
00743                 if( audioTrack )
00744                 {
00745                     QTTimeRange totalRange;
00746                     totalRange.time = QTZeroTime;
00747                     totalRange.duration = [[audioTmpMovie attributeForKey:QTMovieDurationAttribute] QTTimeValue];
00748                     
00749                     [qtexport->movie insertSegmentOfTrack:audioTrack timeRange:totalRange atTime:QTZeroTime];
00750                 }
00751             }
00752             
00753             /* Save file */
00754             dict = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObject:[NSNumber numberWithBool:YES] 
00755                                                forKey:QTMovieFlatten];
00756 
00757             if (dict) {
00758                 [qtexport->movie writeToFile:qtexport->filename withAttributes:dict];
00759             }
00760             
00761             /* Delete temp files */
00762             fileManager = [[NSFileManager alloc] init];
00763             [fileManager removeItemAtPath:qtexport->audioFileName error:&error];
00764             [fileManager removeItemAtPath:qtexport->videoTempFileName error:&error];
00765             [fileManager release];
00766         }
00767         else {
00768             /* Flush update of the movie file */
00769             [qtexport->movie updateMovieFile];
00770             
00771             [qtexport->movie invalidate];
00772         }
00773         
00774         /* Clean up movie structure */
00775         if (qtexport->filename) [qtexport->filename release];
00776         qtexport->filename = nil;
00777         if (qtexport->audioFileName) [qtexport->audioFileName release];
00778         qtexport->audioFileName = nil;
00779         if (qtexport->videoTempFileName) [qtexport->videoTempFileName release];
00780         qtexport->videoTempFileName = nil;
00781         [qtexport->frameAttributes release];
00782         [qtexport->movie release];
00783     }
00784     
00785     [QTMovie exitQTKitOnThread];
00786 
00787     if(qtexport) {
00788         MEM_freeN(qtexport);
00789         qtexport = NULL;
00790     }
00791     [pool drain];
00792 }
00793 
00794 
00795 void free_qtcomponentdata(void)
00796 {
00797 }
00798 
00799 void quicktime_verify_image_type(RenderData *rd, ImageFormatData *imf)
00800 {
00801     if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_QUICKTIME) {
00802         if ((rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType<= 0) ||
00803             (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality <0) ||
00804             (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality > 100)) {
00805             
00806             rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType = kJPEGCodecType;
00807             rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality = (codecHighQuality*100)/codecLosslessQuality;
00808         }
00809         if ((rd->qtcodecsettings.audioSampleRate < 21000) ||
00810             (rd->qtcodecsettings.audioSampleRate > 193000)) 
00811             rd->qtcodecsettings.audioSampleRate = 48000;
00812         
00813         if (rd->qtcodecsettings.audioBitDepth == 0)
00814             rd->qtcodecsettings.audioBitDepth = AUD_FORMAT_S16;
00815         
00816         if (rd->qtcodecsettings.audioBitRate == 0)
00817             rd->qtcodecsettings.audioBitRate = 256000;
00818     }
00819 }
00820 
00821 #endif /* _WIN32 || __APPLE__ */
00822 #endif /* WITH_QUICKTIME */
